title: Teri Hatcher • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #147
itunes:title: Teri Hatcher • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #147
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with world renowned actor and all round superperson TERI HATCHER!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with world renowned actor and all round superperson TERI HATCHER!


…invoking a Superperson on purpose there as you may well know her from being Lois Lane in a galaxy far, far away. Teri is fantastic and such a delight to have on the podcast, and so up for playing too which always makes it a fun episode. Hear it all, from her ayahuasca journey, to her tales of meeting Brett for the first time, to her camper van and subsequent therapy sessions therein, horror films and being scared not only of the content but the names themselves, and her love of dancing from a young age. It’s a treat - so people, please enjoy your friend TERI HATCHER!
